projects.description: The Random Quote Generator displays a randomly selected quote each time the user clicks a button.

Long lists don't make for a good user experience on a web page. This project enhances the usability of a web page that contains a long list by employing JavaScript to dynamically divide the list into "pages". As a bonus, the user can use a search feature to display only the students that match the search criteria.
This project highlights and engaging and dynamic form for registering for a conference.
This fun two-person Tic-Tac-Toe game uses professional programming techniques to solve data-modeling problems with elegant JavaScript code and object-oriented programming.

projects.project_name: Use a Public API to Create an Employee Directory
projects.description: This project uses JavaScript to create an interactive and searchable employee directory by communicating with a third-party API.
